awd_titl_txt: REU: Research Experiences for Undergraduates in Atmospheric Science
awd_abstract_narration: The objective of this work is the active involvement of                    undergraduate students in atmospheric research at New Mexico                    Tech.  Students will be selected from a variety of colleges                     throughout the country as well as from New Mexico Tech.  Many of                the research opportunities will be related to field experiments                 or otherwise will make active use of Tech's collection of                       apparatus designed to measure chemical, physical, or electrical                 properties of the atmosphere.  Some of this equipment may be                    operated at Langmuir Laboratoryfor Atmospheric Research, located                in the Magdalena Mountains west of Socorro.                                          It is hoped that these experiences will lead to more                       students selecting science as a program of study and career.
org_div_long_name: Division of Atmospheric and Geospace Sciences

inst.inst_name: New Mexico Institute of Mining and Technology
